system.description:
Starting at 3rd level, when you prepare your artificer spells you can prepare certain spells and create spell inventions for them in addition to your normal number of prepared spells. These spells count as artificer spells for you, even if they aren’t on the artificer spell list.

Table: Alchemyst Spells

Artificier

Level

5th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.yav7747ibqje7nzm]{Alter Self} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.wanifj91e9h6vbpo]{Enhance Ability}
9th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.y4vmyqfeede94imc]{Gaseous Form} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.d46rmbivvfc5ick8]{Poison Skin}
13th @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.lnbcwy44k19g4bbu]{Fire Shield} @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.95tar7xr3hdp0o92]{Polymorph}
